name: Dustin
overview: Year 1989. The high-security prison of WAD-RAS has a very special prisoner, it is KID SAGUF, better known as DUSTIN, the most famous jewel thief and artwork of his time, which finally and after long persecution of the police has been captured. The whole concern of their guardians is focused on preventing DUSTIN from escaping. For this reason the entire penitentiary has been redesigned so that nothing escapes the control of its Director, however KID SAGUF has been for months pondering, analyzing schedules, memorizing the inner workings of the center and already has its plan to get back the covers of all the newspapers. Not to forget any details, he has written his complete development in a notebook to which we have had access and of which here we reveal his most interesting information.
